tool.name: Merge.taxsummary
tool.command:
echo 'merge.taxsummary( input=${ str($input).replace(",","-") }, output=$output )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile"
tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
.. _Mothur: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Main_Page
**Command Documenation**
The merge.taxsummary command takes a list of tax.summary files separated by dashes and merges them into one file.
.. _merge.taxsummary: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Merge.taxsummary
